about_the_game: Try the standalone demo of Pluto Lost Its Colors, featuring two game modes: Demo and Time Attack. Explore the unique stage in Demo mode to get a feel for the controls and gameplay, and experience some of the challenges that await in the full game. In Time Attack mode, put your skills to the test against the clock as you master Pluto’s movements to achieve your best time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit version 1909 revision .1350 or higher, or versions 2004 and 20H2 revision .789 or higher
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or 12 compatible graphics card with the latest drivers

short_description: Experience the Pluto Lost Its Colors demo with two modes: Demo and Time Attack. Get familiar with the controls in a unique stage or race against the clock to beat your best time.
